website_summaries.verdict: This pressed powder bronzer and highlighter duo is a fan favorite for its perfect warm bronzer and golden highlighter.
pros: Palette available in a fair/medium shade and a medium/dark shade
Easy to blend and build up for more intensity
The bronzer has a slight sheen but doesn’t have any glitter, so it works well on even mature skin
The highlighter gives a candlelit glow that looks lit from within
cons: Many women of color find that the medium/dark palette does not work for them, while people with fair skin may find the fair/medium highlighter too dark

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged. No replacement
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived completely damaged and the powder was broken inside and went everywhere. You should replace this item!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Amerena

customer_reviews.title: The compact is absolutely beautiful, and the product is very-highly pigmented
customer_reviews.text: The compact is absolutely beautiful, and the product is very-highly pigmented; it does what it promises. You will feel like a Hollywood starlet! That being said, I would probably not purchase this again at this price. The product is lovely, but there are others on the market that produce similar effects at a fraction of the price. If you're looking to splurge however, this compact is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Best highlight and contour
customer_reviews.text: Use the contour more than highlight but both are natural and Easy to properly apply.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful palette!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shades of this palette. Makes for a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to use, enhances your beautiful not cover it up.
customer_reviews.author: Serene Nalu

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item was broken into tiny pieces and loose powder was all over the outside of the container. And, there appears to be no way to return/replace it!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L Emond

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: It did not come! Instead I was mailed Magnesium tablets! Please advise
customer_reviews.author: Ilona E.

customer_reviews.title: DON’T HIT THE BUY BUTTON!!
customer_reviews.text: Product was broken when it arrived and company won’t replace. Horrible- Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Help! My brand new compact arrived completely smashed! It made a mess in my bathroom and is unusable. I would expect it to be replaced, at least
customer_reviews.author: mindy brown

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: This came broken to pieces. Just found out no returns. Very dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my makeup artist
customer_reviews.text: A nice product with nice colors that will last you a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jules B-H

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Irritated my skin. Way too much glitter and shine in product.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good solid product. Use it over and over. Like it very much. Good seller.
customer_reviews.author: irene golubchik

product_meta.title: CHARLOTTE TILBURY Filmstar Bronze & Glow by CHARLOTTE TILBURY
product_meta.description: Charlotte Tilbury Filmstar Bronze & Glow contour palette will help you slim, sculpt, shorten, trim and highlight your features for fabulous red carpet ready facial framework. Maximize your assets with award-winning showstopping style! This shade is perfect for fair to medium skin tones for buildable, subtle coverage.
feature_bullets: A luminous complexion is the perfect base for your makeup look, so a gorgeous glow is vital!
The bronzer is a blend of pearl and pigment to help contour your face and mimic that sun-kissed skin.
The highlighter has a golden base to universally flatter any skin tone, with Light Flex Technology to capture and reflect light just where you want it.
Color-rich pigments are rolled into elastomer pearls that smooth and buff your skin for a blendable and even coverage.
Ideal for fair to medium skin tones who want subtle yet buildable color. Paraben-free.
